short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Buy less products online to use your time, money and energy for more fulfilling things

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Committed to helping people struggling with online shopping problems, this extension makes it easy for you to take action. It improves your relationships to friends, family and money.

Set a daily goal for how much time you want to spend shopping online. If your daily timer runs out, we will block your most seductive shopping pages.

Push yourself to reduce this time every day. Take action now!
